statements: UPDATE user_actions SET action_description='Logged in' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_description='Logged out', action_type='logout' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_timestamp = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE action_id = 1 AND user_id = 101;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_description = 'Updated description', action_type = 'Modified' WHERE user_id = 102 AND action_type = 'Created';
UPDATE UserActions SET action = 'login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_details = 'Clicked on Button' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE UserActions SET action = 'Login' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2021-10-01';
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_type = 'Like', interaction_details = 'Liked post #456' WHERE id = 789 AND user_id = 456;

UPDATE interaction_logging SET interaction_details = 'New details', interaction_type = 'Updated type' WHERE interaction_id = 5;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'login', action_description = 'User logged in successfully' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE interaction_logging SET interaction_type = 'click', interaction_details = 'User clicked on a button' WHERE interaction_id = 456;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'modified' WHERE action_id = 1;
UPDATE user_login_logs SET logout_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'Registration' WHERE action_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Comment' WHERE user_id = 100 AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-02-01';

UPDATE platform_changes SET change_details = '{"status": "completed"}' WHERE change_id = 3;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_description = 'Updated action' WHERE action_type = 'like' AND user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'comment' WHERE user_id = 456 AND interaction_details->>'source' = 'website';
